structure.unit: Chapter 4 AMBULANCES AND MEDICAL TRANSPORTATION VEHICLES

text.section:
Sec. 4-9. Compliance.
The continuing validity of a certificate is expressly conditioned upon continued compliance by ambulance service providers with all applicable requirements of State law including, but not limited to, Chapters 316, 322, 395 and 401, Florida Statutes which establish the standards for vehicles, equipment and personnel.
